title: Nintendo Switch 2 Reveal Reportedly This Week - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.13.25
description:
NVIDIA GeForce brings 25 years of advanced PC graphics to today’s gaming!
https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/ 

This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.

Go to http://expressvpn.com/kindafunny to get an extra 4 months free.

Go to http://meundies.com/kindafunny to get 20% off your first order and free shipping.

Switch 2’s reveal is reportedly happening this week, Dynasty Warrior: Origins reviews are here, and PlayStation’s making a Smash Bros MOBA game?

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
GAMESCAST is Game of The Year
The STREAM is Hyper Light Breaker w/ Andy, Bless and the devs
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
You can get today’s Gregway
And you can get Kinda Funny Podcast this afternoon, and tomorrow on YouTube and Podcast services.

00:41:02 - Two weeks into 2025, three studios are already closing down
00:43:41 - Wee News!
